title: Stop mixing tft ranks with league ranks
body: Why does the tft rank overwrite real rank if it's higher? Tft rank is not comparable in any way to the real rank and shouldn't be shown instead of the real rank even if it's higher. This is just stupid. Some people work really hard to get into gold or plat for example and then someone comes with their tft rank and they have everything the same (profile hover and lobby armor). Tft rank should be shown separately or even better move the whole game to another client because tft is not a mode for league it's a completely different game.
